entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Parameter hint truncated at call site #77355
  • Need to add new XML documentation tag to support C# primary constructors #77351
  • Partial default interface members are not virtual #77346
  • EnC: partial events and constructors #77345
  • IDE0200: "Lambda expression can be removed" suggests removing `ConfigureAwait(false)`. #77341
  • [EnC] Deleting partial definition that doesn't have an implementation fails assertion #77340

Closed

  • When source files generated by ISourceGenerator and IIncrementalGenerator are removed "Inheritance margin" and "CodeLens references" features crash #77357
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35825.276 #77348
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35825.320 #77347
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.d18initial-10325.04 #77339

PullRequests

Created

  • Flesh out metadata emit and validation around extension marker method #77358
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Preserve encoding during DocumentState updates #77354
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Collection expression arguments: evaluate arguments before elements when calling `[CollectionBuilder]` factory method #77344
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Extensions: Resolve classic and new extension methods together #77343
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged

Merged

  • Generate-Documentation Check if file is excluded #77353
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix issue where we were crashing trying to get inheritance margin information for SG docs #77356
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Add resource to automate github action merge PRs #77352
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • [release/dev17.13] Fix issue parsing for-statement initializer chain with commas and no initializers #77350
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Expose some functionality from SourceGeneratedDocumentUri to Razor #77342
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Explictly jump off the main thread before serializing data to call Razor #77321
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Implement metadata signature conflict check for extension implementation methods #77338
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Improve performance of SyntaxReplacer.ReplaceNode #77314
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [WIP] Merge RoslynAnalyzers into Roslyn #77178
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev18.0' #77292
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Adds lightbulb option to offer implementing `NotImplementedException` #77299
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Partial events and constructors: IDE #77337
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Feature - Partial Events and Constructors
  • Rework analyzer assembly loading #77004
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Collection expressions: add `params` cases to tests for invalid builder methods #77171
    Area-Compilers, Test, untriaged
